suggestedTasks.title: Add Unit Tests for Project Creation State Management
suggestedTasks.description: Create comprehensive unit tests for the project creation workflow to ensure reliable state updates. Focus on testing the reactive update mechanism, including edge cases like rapid multiple project creation and network latency scenarios. Tests should validate state changes in the projects list component.
suggestedTasks.reason: Ensure reliability of newly implemented reactive update mechanism

suggestedTasks.title: Implement Error Handling for Project Creation State Updates
suggestedTasks.description: Add robust error handling and user feedback for project creation scenarios. Implement graceful error states if project creation fails, ensuring the UI remains consistent and provides clear user communication about the operation status.
suggestedTasks.reason: Improve user experience and system resilience during project creation

patterns: Use reactive state management for immediate UI updates
gotchas: Ensure state updates are atomic and handle race conditions
